topics.title: How to use the calculator
topics.content: The calculator is a simple application for performing mathematical calculations. You can use the buttons to enter numbers and perform calculations.

topics.title: Performing basic calculations
topics.content: To perform a basic calculation, enter the first number, select an operator (+, -, *, /), enter the second number, and then press the '=' button to see the result.

topics.title: Using the history
topics.content: The calculator does not currently have a history feature. All calculations are performed in real-time.
